entry.title: WIND WARNING , Powell River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:18 PM PST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 10.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Powell River Airport 8:00 PM PST Thursday 05 January 2023
Temperature: 10.5°C
Pressure: 100.0 kPa
Humidity: 70 %
Dewpoint: 5.2°C
Wind: ESE 39 km/h gust 63 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Temperature steady near 7.
entry.summary: Rain ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 over exposed coastal sections this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 05 January 2023
